Package virusvoid.logic.objects

Klasse Spaceship

java.lang.Object
java.awt.geom.Point2D
java.awt.Point
virusvoid.logic.objects.GameObject
virusvoid.logic.objects.Spaceship
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class Spaceship extends GameObject
Represents the player's spaceship in the game.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Spaceship

      public Spaceship(int x, int y)
      Initializes a new Spaceship with specified attributes. Also initializes the Hitbox of the Spacship.
      Parameter:
      x - The x-coordinate of the Spaceship.
      y - The y-coordinate of the Spaceship.

  • Methodendetails

    • updateSpaceshipLocation

      public Point updateSpaceshipLocation()
      Updates the location of the spaceship based on user input. (Hitbox of spacship is also updated in here)
      Gibt zurück:
      The updated location of the spaceship.

    • updateDirection

      public void updateDirection(int keycode, boolean pressedOrReleased)
      Updates the movement direction based on keyboard input.
      Parameter:
      keycode - The key code corresponding to the pressed or released key.
      pressedOrReleased - true if the key is pressed, false if released.

    • updateSpaceshipHitbox

      public void updateSpaceshipHitbox(int xDirection, int yDirection)
      Updates the coordinates of the Spaceship's hitbox based on the specified direction.
      Parameter:
      xDirection - The direction in which to update the x-coordinates.
      yDirection - The direction in which to update the y-coordinates.

    • damage

      public void damage(int damage)
      Inflicts damage to the Spaceship and handles the consequences, such as animation and game over.
      Parameter:
      damage - The amount of damage to be inflicted.

    • getHp

      public int getHp()
      Gets the current health points of the Spaceship.
      Gibt zurück:
      The current health points of the Spaceship.

    • getMaxHp

      public int getMaxHp()
      Gets the maximum health points of the Spaceship.
      Gibt zurück:
      The maximum health points of the Spaceship.

    • getSpaceshipHitbox

      public Polygon getSpaceshipHitbox()
      Gets the hitbox polygon representing the Spaceship.
      Gibt zurück:
      The hitbox polygon of the Spaceship.

    • isExploding

      public boolean isExploding()
      Checks if the Spaceship is currently exploding.
      Gibt zurück:
      True if the Spaceship is exploding; otherwise, false.

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Gets the height of the spaceship.
      Angegeben von:
      getHeight in Klasse GameObject
      Gibt zurück:
      The height of the spaceship.

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Gets the width of the spaceship.
      Angegeben von:
      getWidth in Klasse GameObject
      Gibt zurück:
      The width of the spaceship.
